name: Whack-a-Harold
description:
A small game focusing on a minigame, for RMWeb's 2020 Minigame Challenge.

Try your best at Whack-a-Harold, the hottest new game in RM-land!  Use your arrows keys to hit Harold when he appears, but be careful to not miss.  There are ten possible awards, are you up for the challenge to get them all?

Credits: Kadokawa, hiddenone
